name: Fear The Repo
description:
"I believe in nothing" - Theodore Kaczynski
 EPILEPSY WARNING! FEAR THE REPO

The repo men are here. As you wake you know only that you must stop them.

Premise:

Everything is lost. The IRS is coming. You MUST stop them at ANY cost. As a brave and exemplary citizen, you must stand up for your own wealth - do not let anyone take what is yours from YOU.

The team, Moldy Gamers:

Marcel "BloodyEdward" Dąbrowski - lead, music, VFX, level design, gameplay

Cyprian "SirCypkowskyy" Gburek - coding, UI design, tech boy

Jan "ChanJohann" Dzyr - sound design and code, tormented by wwise to this day

Kostya "BountyH" Pshenychnyi - 3D assets, overall style, enviro

Aleksy Czyżkowska - 2D assets, overall style, character design

Note - final project is more of a vertical slice than a finished production. Treat it as a kind of tech demo...
